item.title: A PostgreSQL Cheat Sheet for OSX and R
item.description: I keep this on my desktop. Install: brew install postgresql initdb /usr/local/var/postgres -E utf8 gem install lunchy ### Start postgres with lunchy mkdir -p ~/Library/LaunchAgents cp /usr/local/Cellar/postgresql/9.3.3/homebrew.mxcl.postgresql.plist ~/Library/LaunchAgents/ Setup DB from SQL file: ### Setup DB lunchy start postgres created $DBNAME psql -d $DBNAME -f '/path/to/file.sql' lunchy stop postgres Starting and Stopping PostgreSQL lunchy start postgres lunchy stop postgres may run into trouble with local socketâ€¦ try this:
